title: Ticket #7059: memory leak in condor_annex
description: Coverity found a memory leak in annex/annex-create.cpp that's going to take a fair bit of coding to fix: the s3gahp can't be deleted in the function (or class) in which it's allocated, since the UploadFile functor needs it. Luckily, we've already solved this problem for the other gahp pointers, so we have a good map to follow.
